title: Triple-A/Double-A should appear with hyphen everywhere in app
Supported Leagues
custom_steps: When the user is navigating within the app and is viewing the leagues and teams
custom_expected:
Then only team names should appear for the following leagues:

- International
- Pacific
- Eastern
- Southern
- Texas
- California
- Carolina
- Florida
- Midwest
- South Atlantic
- New York-Penn
- Northwest
- Appalachian
- Pioneer

The following Leagues are NOT supported:
- Arizona
- Dominican
- Gulf
- Mexican

http://www.milb.com/milb/info/teams.jsp

title: North Division: Verify Team Name, Logo, and Division placement
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user taps the Teams button in the More section
AND the user taps on Triple A under the 'Select by MILB Class'
custom_expected:
Then the teams should be ordered in the International league North Division in the following order:
1) Buffalo Bisons
2) Lehigh Valley IronPigs
3) Pawtucket Red Sox
4) Rochester Red Wings
5) Scranton/Wilkes-Barre RailRiders
6) Syracuse Chiefs

And the logo should appear for each team.

title: Verify launcher icon image is clear (should read MiLB)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is located on the device home screen
custom_steps: When the user looks at the launcher icon
custom_expected:
Then they see a clear image
And the text under the icon should read "MiLB"

title: Verify splash screen image is clear and readable MiLB.com
custom_preconds:
Given the app is installed
Given the app is not active or has just been killed by the user
custom_steps: When the user launches the app
custom_expected: Then they see the splash screen and see a clear image and can read that it says "First Pitch" and below that should say "MiLB.com"
